docs.snippet: U.S. stock indexes closed moderately lower on Friday following three days of gains. Several technology stocks traded heavily, including Yahoo, Twitter and Facebook. Energy stocks fell along with a steep decline in the price of oil.

headline.print_headline: Stocks Move Lower as Energy, Technology Stocks Fall
headline.main: Stocks Move Lower as Energy, Technology Stocks Fall

docs.snippet: If you find yourself wasting too much time online when you really need to be working, you have many ways to force yourself (temporarily) offline.

headline.main: Escape the Web and Get Things Done

docs.snippet: How diverse are the sources in your social media feed, and why does it matter?

headline.print_headline: Is Your Online World Just a ‘Filter Bubble’ of People With the Same Opinions?
headline.main: Is Your Online World Just a ‘Filter Bubble’ of People With the Same Opinions?

docs.snippet: The Paris prosecutor's office has opened an investigation into death threats against the French satirical newspaper Charlie Hebdo, which was the target of an extremist attack in 2015.

headline.print_headline: France Investigates Threats Against Charlie Hebdo Newspaper
headline.main: France Investigates Threats Against Charlie Hebdo Newspaper

docs.snippet: Many of the recent menacing clown sightings are hoaxes, but they appear to be inspiring copy-cat pranks and occasional acts of violence.

headline.main: What's Behind the Spreading Creepy Clown Hysteria?

docs.abstract: Many of the recent menacing clown sightings are hoaxes, but they appear to be inspiring copy-cat pranks and occasional acts of violence.

docs.snippet: Oksana Yushko has been photographing Russians who have fled big city life to get back to the land – and basics – along the Volga River.

headline.main: Along Russia’s Volga River, Back to the Simple Life

docs.abstract: Oksana Yushko has been photographing Russians who have fled big city life to get back to the land – and basics – along the Volga River.

docs.snippet: Yahoo stock slumped after the company announced hackers had stolen information from at least 500 million users, but Twitter stock jumped on word of deal talks.

headline.print_headline: Wall Street Dips as Oil Prices Tumble
headline.main: Wall St. Closes Lower, With Oil Prices in Focus

docs.snippet: The posters this artist plastered all over New York represent a pre-Facebook era of political statement; some 100 of them will be shown at Alden Projects.

headline.print_headline: A Jenny Holzer Show of Early Works
headline.main: Taking It to the Street With Jenny Holzer

docs.abstract: Alden Projects gallery plans exhibition of early works by artist Jenny Holzer.

docs.snippet: Star tennis player Serena Williams says she "won't be silent" about the killing of black men by police officers.

headline.print_headline: Williams Writes She 'Won't Be Silent' About Police Killings
headline.main: Williams Writes She 'Won't Be Silent' About Police Killings
